articles.title: BigCommerce is Adding More AI Tools to its Platform with the Help of Google
articles.description: BigCommerce — the e-commerce platform used by businesses including apparel brand Badgley Mischka and furniture retailer Burrow — is beefing up its artificial intelligence tools to help merchants grow their online web stores and drive customer growth.

articles.title: How B2B Startup Inhaven is Reworking Vacation Rentals
articles.description: Inhaven founder and CEO Ashley Ching uses her experience managing high-end brands and ecommerce to usher in a new level of quality furnishings to the burgeoning vacation rental market.

articles.title: BigCommerce Launches Storefront Technology Featuring Composable Architecture
articles.description: BigCommerce has introduced a new storefront technology that aims to simplify the process of building online stores using a composable architecture.

articles.title: Despite Economic Challenges, Cyber Week 2023 Achieves Record-breaking Online Sales: A Conversation with Meghan Stabler of BigCommerce
articles.description: BigCommerce’s senior vice president of marketing Meghan Stabler discusses the driving forces behind the remarkable growth of online sales during Cyber Week 2023.

articles.title: The Top 3 Fashion Ecommerce Trends Driving Holiday Sales
articles.description: With recent data showing that consumers are still willing to spend on apparel and accessories, online retailers can foster holiday season fashion apparel sales with AI, user-generated content, and sustainability, writes Meghan Stabler, senior vice president of marketing at ecommerce technology provider BigCommerce.

articles.title: Holiday Retail Strategy: Doubling Down on AI and Omnichannel Approach Amid Economic Uncertainty
articles.description: Meghan Stabler from BigCommerce discusses the shift toward technology-driven, customer-centric experiences, the rise of social commerce and BNPL.

articles.title: The Holiday Season’s Cybersecurity Crisis: Why Retailers are Under Heightened Pressure
articles.description: While it’s clear that cybersecurity attacks are on the rise and the importance of robust cybersecurity measures in the retail sector is rapidly increasing, the forces driving this mounting pressure among retailers are less known.
